mods.abstract: $50 REWARD. RUNAWAY from the subscriber's since the month of july 1854, the red negro HENRY, aged about 16 years, having 5 feet 3 inch high, forehead prominent, two [illegible] Said reward will be given to the person who will put him in the hands of the undersigned, or lodged him in on eof the State jails. J. M. LAPEZE St John the Baptist, june 9 1854. 2m
